LanguageData.Shell_HighExplosive.label: 81mm mortar shell (HE)
LanguageData.Shell_HighExplosive.description: Low-velocity shell designed to be fired from a mortar.
LanguageData.Shell_Incendiary.label: 81mm mortar shell (Incendiary)
LanguageData.Shell_Incendiary.description: Low-velocity shell designed to be fired from a mortar.
LanguageData.Shell_EMP.label: 81mm mortar shell (EMP)
LanguageData.Shell_EMP.description: Low-velocity shell designed to be fired from a mortar.
LanguageData.Shell_Firefoam.label: 81mm mortar shell (Firefoam)
LanguageData.Shell_Firefoam.description: A pressurized shell filled with fire-extinguishing foam. Can be fired from mortars or installed as a trap. Explodes when damaged.
